TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class EventAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class EventAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定事件的其他事件結構描述資訊。

span.span: Specifies additional event schema information for an event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將此屬性套用至上定義的 ETW 事件方法-衍生的類別，您必須呼叫方法基底類別，傳遞事件 ID，後面的相同引數傳入已定義的方法。When you apply this attribute to an ETW event method defined on an -derived class, you must call the method on the base class, passing the event ID, followed by the same arguments as the defined method is passed. 您應該遵循下列範例所示的模式。You should follow the pattern shown in the following examples. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別來定義各種不同的事件。The following example shows how to use the class to define a variety of events. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ETWTrace#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ETWTrace#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/vb/program.vb#5)] [!code-csharp[ETWTrace#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ETWTrace#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/vb/program.vb#6)] [!code-csharp[ETWTrace#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/cs/program.cs#7)] [!code-vb[ETWTrace#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/vb/program.vb#7)] [!code-csharp[ETWTrace#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/cs/program.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ETWTrace#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/vb/program.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventActivityOptions ActivityOptions { System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventActivityOptions get(); void set(System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventActivityOptions value); };

summary.span: 指定活動之開始和停止事件的行為。

span.span: Specifies the behavior of the start and stop events of an activity.

summary.span: 活動是應用程式中從開始到停止之間的時間區域。

span.span: An activity is the region of time in an app between the start and the stop.
Returns .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventChannel Channel { System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventChannel get(); void set(System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventChannel value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應該寫入事件的其他事件記錄檔。

span.span: Gets or sets an additional event log where the event should be written.

value.span: 應該寫入事件的其他事件記錄檔。

span.span: An additional event log where the event should be written.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventId As Integer
public: property int EventId { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定事件的識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the identifier for the event.
The event identifier.

value.span: 這個值必須介於 0 到 65535 之間。

span.span: This value should be between 0 and 65535.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須大於 0 或小於 65535 或追蹤作業可能會發生錯誤。 should be greater than 0 or less than 65535 or errors can occur in a tracing operation. 如果發生錯誤，您可以取得有關錯誤的來源的詳細資訊檢查輸出資料流的偵錯工具，如果您有偵錯工具附加至處理程序引發的事件。If errors do occur, you can get more information about the source of the error by checking the output stream of the debugger, if you have a debugger attached to the process firing events. 如果有發生錯誤的事件來源的 ETW 接聽程式，您也可以尋找的 ETW 事件資料流中報告的錯誤。You can also look for errors reported in the ETW event stream, if you have an ETW listener on the event source where the error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventKeywords Keywords { System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventKeywords get(); void set(System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventKeywords value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定事件的關鍵字。

span.span: Gets or sets the keywords for the event.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定事件的訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets the message for the event.
The message for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用標準.NET Framework 替代運算子 (例如，{1}) 字串中）。You can use standard .NET Framework substitution operators (for example, {1}) in the string). 它們將會以對應的組件的事件裝載的字串表示取代。They will be replaced with the string representation of the corresponding part of the event payload. ``` [Event(1, Message = "Application Falure: {0}", Level = EventLevel.Error, Keywords = Keywords.Diagnostic)] public void Failure(string message) { WriteEvent(1, message); } ``` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定事件訊息。The following example shows how to use the property to specify event messages. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ETWTrace#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ETWTrace#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/vb/program.vb#5)] [!code-csharp[ETWTrace#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ETWTrace#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/vb/program.vb#6)] [!code-csharp[ETWTrace#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/cs/program.cs#7)] [!code-vb[ETWTrace#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/etwtrace/vb/program.vb#7)]

summary.span: 事件標記是記錄事件時所傳遞的使用者定義值。

span.span: An event tag is a user-defined value that is passed through when the event is logged.
Returns the value.
